entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ImageButton can't adjust remote image size if size request #21819
  • Switches should have their own options to Color their Thumb and Tint for state On/Off #21817
  • [Spec, WiP] Provide better hooks for shell so users can better tune services and service scopes #21816
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Spec] Add better parameters for navigation args #21814
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Cannot run Debug build on iOS simulator #21811
  • Magic error #21810

Closed

  • Opacity bug on BoxView.Background #19926
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Remove old information from UITesting.md #21815
  • Add Links to Testing WIKI #21813

Updated

  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    community ✨
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
